Class OfficerRegistrationController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.OfficerRegistrationController
public class OfficerRegistrationController extends Object
Controller for managing HDB Officer registrations to projects. Uses project name as the unique project identifier. Handles registration, approval, rejection, and cancellation.
Since:
2025-04-20

  • Method Details

    • registerOfficerForProject

      public boolean registerOfficerForProject(String officerNRIC, String projectName)
      Registers an HDB Officer for a project.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false otherwise

    • approveRegistration

      public boolean approveRegistration(String registrationId, String managerNRIC)
      Approves an officer registration.
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration
      managerNRIC - The NRIC of the approving manager
      Returns:
      true if approval is successful, false otherwise

    • rejectRegistration

      public boolean rejectRegistration(String registrationId, String managerNRIC, String remarks)
      Rejects an officer registration.
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration
      managerNRIC - The NRIC of the rejecting manager
      remarks - Optional remarks for the rejection
      Returns:
      true if rejection is successful, false otherwise

    • getRegistrationStatus

      public String getRegistrationStatus(String officerNRIC, String projectName)
      Gets the registration status for an officer and project.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The registration status, or null if not found

    • cancelRegistration

      public boolean cancelRegistration(String officerNRIC, String projectName)
      Cancels a pending registration.
      Parameters:
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      true if cancellation is successful, false otherwise
